name: Amazoness Spy
desc: You can reveal 1 other "Amazoness" monster in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Amazoness Spy" once per turn. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Amazoness" monster in your GY, except "Amazoness Spy"; return it to the hand, or shuffle it into the Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Arcana Knight Joker
desc:
"Queen's Knight" + "Jack's Knight" + "King's Knight"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above materials. Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that targets this face-up card on the field (Quick Effect): You can discard the same type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap); negate the effect.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Armored Zombie
desc: This warrior blindly swings a deadly blade with devastating force.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Block Attack
desc: Target 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls; change that target to face-up Defense Position.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
desc: "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Buster Blader
desc: Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Call of the Haunted (Skill Card)
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, place this card in your center Spell & Trap Zone. You cannot activate this Skill during your first turn of the Duel. You draw 1 less card at the beginning of the Duel.] 

Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Clown Zombie
desc: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Common Charity
desc: Draw 2 cards, then banish 1 Normal Monster from your hand, or, if you do not have any in your hand, send your entire hand to the GY.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Conscription
desc: Excavate the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if it is a monster that can be Normal Summoned/Set, Special Summon it to your field. Otherwise, add that card to your opponent's hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: De-Spell
desc: Target 1 face-up Spell, or 1 Set Spell/Trap, on the field; destroy that target if it is a Spell. (If the target is Set, reveal it.)
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Decayed Commander
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Zombie Tiger" from your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Discard 1 random card from their hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Desert Twister
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 WIND and 1 EARTH monsters from your GY. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Diffusion Wave-Motion
desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Fusion" card.)
If your opponent controls a monster: Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Level 7 or higher Spellcaster monster you control; this turn, it must attack all monsters your opponent controls once each, also other monsters you control cannot attack. The effects of monsters destroyed by these attacks cannot activate and are negated.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Dragon Zombie
desc: A dragon revived by sorcery. Its breath is highly corrosive.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Ectoplasmic Fortification!
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.] 

Once per turn, if you control a Zombie monster, you can place 1 counter on this card. All Zombie monsters you control gain 100 ATK and lose 100 DEF for each counter on this card. Any battle damage you take from battles involving your Zombie monster is doubled.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Gravekeeper's Ambusher
desc: When this card is flipped face-up: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; place that target on the bottom of their Deck. If this card is sent from the field to the GY after being flipped face-up: You can target 1 "Necrovalley" card in your GY; add that target to your hand. These effects are unaffected by "Necrovalley".
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Great Mammoth of Goldfine
desc: "The Snake Hair" + "Dragon Zombie"
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Half Shut
desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it cannot be destroyed by battle this turn, also its ATK is halved until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Harpie's Pet Dragon
desc: Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each "Harpie Lady" on the field.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Jack's Knight
desc: A strong master swordsman. His loyalty is to justice, his duty to protect the weak.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: King of the Skull Servants
desc: The original ATK of this card is the combined number of "King of the Skull Servants" and "Skull Servant" in your GY x 1000. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can banish 1 other "King of the Skull Servants" or 1 "Skull Servant" from your GY; Special Summon this card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: King's Knight
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned while you control "Queen's Knight": You can Special Summon 1 "Jack's Knight" from your Deck.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Limit Impulse
desc: Send 2 cards from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 2 "Soul Tokens" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). They cannot be Tributed except for a Tribute Summon.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Magical Ghost
desc: This creature casts a spell of terror and confusion just before attacking its enemies.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Magicians Unite
desc: If you control 2 or more Attack Position Spellcaster monsters: Target 1 of them; its ATK becomes 3000 until the end of this turn, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, other Spellcaster monsters you control cannot attack.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Meteor Black Dragon
desc: "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" + "Meteor Dragon"
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Michizure
desc: When a monster is sent from the field to your GY, even during the Damage Step: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Mystic Horseman
desc: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Possessed Dark Soul
desc: You can Tribute this face-up card; take control of all face-up Level 3 or lower monsters your opponent currently controls.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Queen's Knight
desc: This knight catches her opponents off guard, dominating them with swift yet graceful attacks.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Rabid Horseman
desc: "Battle Ox" + "Mystic Horseman"
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Royal Flush
desc:
[Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.]

Once per turn, if you control "Queen's Knight", you can pay 1000 LP to Normal Summon 1 "King's Knight" in addition to your Normal Summon or Set. "King's Knight" and "Jack's Knight" you control cannot attack directly the turn you use this Skill.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Senju of the Thousand Hands
desc: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Shield & Sword
desc: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters currently on the field, until the end of this turn.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Skull Servant
desc: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Sphere Kuriboh
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; change the attacking monster to Defense Position. When you Ritual Summon, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Straight to the Grave
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Zone and flip it over.]

All Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Sword of Dragon's Soul
desc: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 700 ATK. After damage calculation, if the equipped monster battled a Dragon monster: Destroy that monster at the end of that Battle Phase.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: The Shallow Grave
desc: Each player targets 1 monster in their own GY; each player Special Summons the target from their GY in face-down Defense Position.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: The Snake Hair
desc: A monster with a head of poison snakes. One look from this monster can turn an opponent to stone.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Tomb of the Pharaoh
desc:
[At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Zone and flip it over.]

This card's name is always treated as "Necrovalley".
All "Gravekeeper's" monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Twister
desc: Pay 500 LP, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Veil of Darkness
desc: During your Draw Phase, if you draw a DARK monster(s): You can reveal any number of them; send them to the GY, then you can draw 1 more card.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Violet Crystal
desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Crystal" card.)
Equip only to a Zombie monster. It gains 300 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Wasteland
desc: All Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Whiptail Crow
desc: Attacks from the skies with a whip-like tail.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: White Elephant's Gift
desc: Send 1 face-up non-Effect Monster you control to the GY; draw 2 cards.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou
desc: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 monster on the field; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK. Negate the effects of opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with the equipped monster.
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

name: Zombie Tiger
desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "Decayed Commander" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in Attack Position. While equipped by this effect, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. If the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Discard 1 random card from their hand. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead.)
Set_Name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls
